00029   namespace EEPROM {
00030     struct ADDR {
00031       enum {
00032         product_id = 8
00033       } ;
00034     } ;

00036   namespace FPGA {
00037     // Fx2 MCU <-> FPGA serial io data structure
00038     struct sioctl {
00039       struct CMD {
00040         enum {
00041           fifo_enable = 0x01,
00042           dither      = 0x02,
00043           gain_high   = 0x04
00044         } ;
00045       } ;
00046       sioctl(boost::uint8_t ctl_=0, boost::uint32_t freg_=0)
00047         : ctl(ctl_)
00048         , freg(freg_) {}
00049       const sioctl& set_ctl(boost::uint8_t ctl_) { ctl=ctl_; return *this; }
00050       const sioctl& set_freg(boost::uint32_t freg_) { freg=freg_; return *this; }
00051       boost::uint8_t  ctl;
00052       boost::uint32_t freg;
00053     } __attribute__((__packed__));
00054   } // namespace FPGA
00055 
00056   // forward declaration
00057   class product_id;
00058 
00059   class fx2_control : private boost::noncopyable {
00060   public:
00061     struct EndPoint {    
00062       enum {
00063         cmd     = 0x01,
00064         status  = 0x81,
00065         data_in = 0x82
00066       } ;
00067     } ;
00068     typedef boost::shared_ptr<fx2_control> sptr;
00069     virtual ~fx2_control() {}
00070     static sptr make(boost::uint16_t, boost::uint16_t, size_t);
00071     
00072     virtual usb_control::sptr get_usb_control() = 0;
00073     virtual usb_device_handle::sptr get_usb_device_handle() = 0;
00074 
00075     virtual bool is_configured() const = 0;
00076 
00077     virtual void load_firmware(std::string) = 0;
00078     virtual void load_fpga(std::string) = 0;
00079     virtual boost::uint8_t set_port(boost::uint8_t) = 0;
00080     virtual FPGA::sioctl fpga_sio(const FPGA::sioctl&) = 0;
00081 
00082     template<typename T> 
00083     T read_eeprom(boost::uint16_t addr) {
00084       T result;
00085       const eeprom_data data(read_eeprom_lowlevel(addr, sizeof(T)));
00086       std::copy(data.begin(), data.end(), (boost::uint8_t*)&result);
00087       return result;
00088     }
00089     virtual const Perseus::product_id& get_eeprom_pid(std::string ) = 0;
00090   protected:
00091     typedef std::vector<boost::uint8_t> eeprom_data;
00092     virtual eeprom_data read_eeprom_lowlevel(boost::uint16_t, size_t) = 0;
00093   } ;
00094 } // namespace Perseus
